risking their lives on the railway hits 10-year-high</li>\n                                    </ul>\n                                </div>\n                            </a></div><div             <div data-info-content=\"\" style=\"height: 160px;\">\n                        <span>Our pledge:</span>\n                        <p class=\"info-box__text\">We’re committed to being a caring neighbour, keeping our communities informed and engaging them in our plan to improve Britain's railway</p>\n                    </div>\n                    \n                        <ul We’re responsible for maintaining and renewing our 20,000 miles of track. From quiet...</p>\n                                        </div>\n\n                                    </article>\n                                </a></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 352.5px; margin-right: 20px;\"><a class=\"item\" href=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/feeds/spotlight-easter-bank-holiday-london-bridge/\" itemprop=\"relatedLink\" data-item=\"\" style=\"height: 535px;\">\n                                    <article class=\"item  cards-min-height-helper animated\" itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/NewsArticle\" data-anim=\"fadeInDown\">\n                                        <header>\n                                           <div class=\"sow-carousel-thumbnail\">\n                                                                                                   <img class=\"\" src=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/IMG_0336-503x312.jpg\" alt=\"\">\n                                                                                            </div>\n                                            <h4>Spotlight on Easter: London Bridge improvements</h4>\n                                            <time class=\"related entry-time\" datetime=\"2017-03-15\" itemprop=\"datePublished\">\n                                                  Mar 15, 2017                                            </time>\n                                        </header>\n\n                                        <div class=\"description\" itemprop=\"description\">\n                                           <p>London Bridge improvements are part of the Thameslink Programme.</p>\n                                        </div>\n\n                                    </article>\n                                </a></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 352.5px; margin-right: 20px;\"><a class=\"item\" href=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/feeds/frontline-emergency-teams-star-tonights-inside-kings-cross-railway/\" itemprop=\"relatedLink\" data-item=\"\" style=\"height: 535px;\">\n                                    <article class=\"item  cards-min-height-helper animated\" itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/NewsArticle\" data-anim=\"fadeInDown\">\n                                        <header>\n                                           <div class=\"sow-carousel-thumbnail\">\n                                                                                                   <img class=\"\" src=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/jamie-morgan-a-mobile-operations-manager-for-network-rail-503x312.jpg\" alt=\"\">\n                                                                                            </div>\n                                            <h4>Frontline emergency teams star in TV documentary</h4>\n                                            <time class=\"related entry-time\" datetime=\"2017-03-13\" itemprop=\"datePublished\">\n                                                  Mar 13, 2017                                            </time>\n                                        </header>\n\n                                        <div class=\"description\" itemprop=\"description\">\n                                           <p>Emergency response teams at Network Rail have a starring role in Monday’s (13 March) episode of Inside King’s Cross: The...</p>\n                                        </div>\n\n                                    </article>\n                                </a></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 352.5px; margin-right: 20px;\"><a class=\"item\" href=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/feeds/network-rail-encourages-young-women-consider-stem-career-international-womens-day/\" itemprop=\"relatedLink\" data-item=\"\" style=\"height: 535px;\">\n                                    <article class=\"item  cards-min-height-helper animated\" itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/NewsArticle\" data-anim=\"fadeInDown\">\n                                        <header>\n                                           <div class=\"sow-carousel-thumbnail\">\n                                                                                                   <img class=\"\" src=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/IMG_0488-503x312.jpg\" alt=\"\">\n                                                                                            </div>\n                                            <h4>Network Rail encourages young women to consider a STEM career this International Women’s Day</h4>\n                                            <time class=\"related entry-time\" datetime=\"2017-03-08\" itemprop=\"datePublished\">\n                                                  Mar 8, 2017                                            </time>\n                                        </header>\n\n                                        <div class=\"description\" itemprop=\"description\">\n                                           <p>To&nbsp;coincide with International Women’s Day (Wednesday 8 March), Network Rail is asking young women to consider science, technology, engineering and...</p>\n                                        </div>\n\n                                    </article>\n                                </a></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 352.5px; margin-right: 20px;\"><a class=\"item\" href=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/feeds/focus-level-crossings/\" itemprop=\"relatedLink\" data-item=\"\" style=\"height: 535px;\">\n                                    <article class=\"item  cards-min-height-helper animated\" itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/NewsArticle\" data-anim=\"fadeInDown\">\n                                        <header>\n                                           <div class=\"sow-carousel-thumbnail\">\n                                                                                                   <img class=\"\" src=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/the-level-crossings-at-moss-road-and-fenwick-lane-will-be-closed-for-nine-days-503x312.jpg\" alt=\"\">\n                                                                                            </div>\n                                            <h4>In focus – level crossings</h4>\n                                            <time class=\"related entry-time\" datetime=\"2017-03-07\" itemprop=\"datePublished\">\n                                                  Mar 7, 2017                                            </time>\n                                        </header>\n\n                                        <div class=\"description\" itemprop=\"description\">\n                                           <p>There are around 6,000 level crossings in Britain. Every day they save thousands of lives by protecting us from one...</p>\n                                        </div>\n\n                                    </article>\n                                </a></div></div></div><div class=\"owl-controls\"><div class=\"owl-nav\"><div class=\"owl-prev\" style=\"display: none;\">prev</div><div class=\"owl-next\" style=\"display: none;\">next</div></div></div></div><!-- owl -->\n            </div><!--col-100 -->\n        </div><!-- row -->\n    </div><!-- container -->\n</section>\n<!-- Cards on grey background: end -->\n\n<!--social box-->\n<section class=\"socialboxes full\" id=\"socialboxes\">\n\t<div class=\"row no-margin\">\n\t\t<div class=\"mob-col-100 tab-col-100 col-50 twitter social-box\" style=\"\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"content animated\" data-anim=\"fadeIn\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"icon-wrap\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<i class=\"fa fa-fw fa-twitter\"></i>\n\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t<p class=\"channel\">#NetworkRail</p>\n\t\t\t\t<p class=\"social-content\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/hashtag/Streatham\" target=\"_blank\">#Streatham</a> Lines are open however delays may occur. Check <a href=\"http://twitter.com/nationalrailenq\" target=\"_blank\">@nationalrailenq</a> for service information.</p> \n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\"link--white\" href=\"https://twitter.com/networkrail\" target=\"_self\">Follow us on Twitter</a>\n\t\t\t\t<span class=\"social-line\"></span> \n\t\t\t\t<span class=\"social-posted\">Posted 22 Apr 2017</span>\n\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t<div class=\"mob-col-100 tab-col-100 col-50 facebook social-box\" style=\"\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"content animated\" data-anim=\"fadeIn\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"icon-wrap\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<i class=\"fa fa-fw fa-facebook\"></i>\n\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t<p class=\"channel\">Network Rail</p>\n\t\t\t\t<p class=\"social-content\">For more information and news on Network Rail, please visit us on Facebook<br>\n<br>\n</p> \n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\"link--white\" href=\"https://www.facebook.com/networkrail/\" target=\"_self\">Visit us on Facebook</a>\n\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</section>\n<!--social box: end-->\n\t</div><!-- hp-wrap -->\n\n</article><!-- #post-## -->\n\n\t\n\t<div class=\"cookie_notification\" aria-label=\"Cookie notification\" id=\"cookie_notif\" data-cookie=\"\" style=\"\">\n\t<div class=\"container\">\n\t\t<div class=\"row no-margin\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"mob-col-100 tab-col-100 col-100\">\n\t\t\t\t<button class=\"close-notification\" data-close=\"\" aria-label=\"Close cookie notification\"><i class=\"fa fa-times\" aria-hidden=\"true\" role=\"button\" aria-controls=\"#cookie_notif\"></i></button>\n\t\t\t\t<h4>\n\t\t\t\t\t<svg aria-hidden=\"true\" class=\"cookie_notification__icon\"><use xmlns:xlink=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink\" xlink:href=\"#notification\"></use></svg>\n\t\t\t\t\tNetwork Rail Cookie Policy\t\t\t\t</h4>\n\t\t\t\t<p></p><p>We use cookies to give you the best possible experience on the Network Rail website. By browsing this website you give consent for cookies to be used. For more details, including how you can amend your preferences, such as by disabling cookie usage on our site, please read our <a href=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/privacy-policy/\">Cookie Policy</a>.</p>\n<p></p>\n\n\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</div>\t\n\t<footer id=\"footer\" class=\"footer\"> \n\t\t<!-- desktop -->\n\t\t<div class=\"container\">\n\t\t\t<div
